text: Þis syn þara X hida longemæra to suþham þe þa III hida binnan synd þe wistan forworhte wið þone cyning æþelred mid unrihtum monslihte.
And fifte healf hid æt hlodbroce & æt hreodburnan.
Þe mid þam oþrum lande forworhte wæron.
And he hyra ealra geuþe his ealdormen leofwine a in ece yrfe.
Þæt is þonne þær hlodbroc fealþ on ycænan æfter streame þæt to þæm hyærde wycan.
Fram þam hyerde wycan up to þam ællenstubbe to þam mærstanæ.
Of þam mærstane to þæm gemyþan.
And æfter streame þæt to beornewæaldes hlawe.
Of þam hlawe to þam pytte up on þam beanhlande.
And to þæm pytte & swa of þem pytte to coccebyle & to yppescelfe.
Of yppescelfe æfter þæm heafdan to hæahhewellan.
Of þam wyllan to hlodbroce.
Æfter þæm broce þæt æft on ycenan.
Þis syn þa hlandgemære into hlodbroce & to hreodburnan.
Þæt is þonne to wylman forda & of þam forda efter sealtstrete to þam grenan wege.
Of þam wege þæt æft on wylman broce æfter streame þæt on hreodbroce.
Of þam broce þæt up to þam hlangan þorne.
Of þam þorne æfter þam heafdan þæt on þa wyllan æt hlodbroce æfter streame þæt þonne up æfter þam heafdan to þam mere.
Of þam mere to þam hlawe on yppescelfe.
Of þam hlawe to grenan hylle of þam hlawe to cocgebyll.
Of cocgebyll æfter heafdan to þam wætergefeal æfter streame þæt on stanhemeforde of þam fordæ þæt æft on wylman forde.
